projects.title: Algorithmic fairness
projects.description: Using different classification algorithms and different classifiers such as Random Forest, Support Vector Machines(SVM), etc on different datasets such as Adult, Bank, etc. so as to calculate the discrepancy and disparate impact on sensitive classes and now working on to create a two-layer neural network with e Lagrangian Multiplier method to incorporate the constraints within a single overall loss.
